name: MadOut2 BigCityOnline
description:
There are no rules - only the need to win, you can create any chaos.

* Online Mode - play with your friends
* Open world - explore it
* Over 30 different cars available
* Many racing with weapons
* Bonuses - rockets, mines, bullet
* Different weather conditions
* Advanced car destruction
* Angry bots
* Crazy Russian cars

Game still in development! New features coming soon.
